edu.osu.slate.relatedness
Interface RelatednessInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
SourcedPageRank, SPRValidVertexRelatedness
public interface RelatednessInterface

Method Summary
 double[] getRelatedness(int from)
          Calculates and returns the relatedness for all vertices in the graph.
 double[] getRelatedness(int[] from)
          Calculates and returns the relatedness for all vertices in the graph.
 double[] getRelatedness(int[] from, float[] vals)
          Calculates and returns the relatedness for all vertices in the graph.
 double getRelatedness(int from, int to)
          Calculates and returns the relatedness value for a single vertex in the graph.
 

Method Detail

getRelatedness

double getRelatedness(int from,
                      int to)
Calculates and returns the relatedness value for a single vertex in the graph.
This may or may not entail calculating the values for all vertices in the graph. Check with the implementing class for details.

Parameters:
from - Vertex ID number (compressed)
to - Vertex ID number (compressed)
Returns:
Value of relatedness for the to vertex, given the from vertex.

getRelatedness

double[] getRelatedness(int from)
Calculates and returns the relatedness for all vertices in the graph.

Parameters:
from - Vertex ID number (compressed)
Returns:
A double[] of values for each graph vertex, given the from vertex.

getRelatedness

double[] getRelatedness(int[] from)
Calculates and returns the relatedness for all vertices in the graph.

Parameters:
from - Vertex ID numbers (compressed)
Returns:
A double[] of values for each graph vertex, given the from vertex list.

getRelatedness

double[] getRelatedness(int[] from,
                        float[] vals)
Calculates and returns the relatedness for all vertices in the graph.

Parameters:
from - from Vertex ID numbers (compressed)
vals - non-uniform weighting values for the vertex numbers
Returns:
A double[] of values for each graph vertex, given the from vertex list.
